TopicTitle: we NEED an updated Kerbtown successor

Articles.Content:
as the title says. 

"why do we need an updated kerbtown successor?"

just LOOK what you can do with kerbtown:
 


if someone took these capabilities to the next level, made a fleshed out explorable zone, whatever celestial body it was made on would instantly become the COOLEST celestial body in both vanilla KSP or any KSP planet pack. 
but they cant because kerbtown isnt updated!

Imagine five years from now. 

KSP2's music, godly visuals and maybe even improved performance. Paired with a community built engaging storyline that utilizes the descendant mod of kerbtown, used to build expansive and unique places to explore on the bodies around kerbol, requiring challenging and engaging crafts to be built. Off the top of my head, a cave system in a Valles Marineris analogue, Vall with a crack in it, leading into it's chemically messy ocean, (with beautiful parallax plant life in the icy ocean deeps.) Actual lava tubes to build bases in.  

Anyone else have any thoughts on the endless possibilities that still lay unfocused with KSP?
